bio: @MaddyRoss we believe in quality and attention to detail. We have over 15 years of experience in providing a 1 stop solution for our partners. Be it Websites/Social Media Management/Brand Kit or Digital/Print Design. Our portfolio includes (but is not limited to) design for : brochures, flyers, print ads, billboards, info graphics, invitation cards, magazine covers and layouts, email ads, social media ads, web banners, cd covers, booklet designs, catalog design, company annual reports, hoardings, stationary, posters, letterhead, visiting cards, calendars, product packaging (some examples of work done is design for : shampoo bottles, dairy products, confectionery items etc), real estate projects design campaign, book titles, newsletter among others. We are experienced, reliable and work towards meeting deadlines every time. We are a team of thorough professionals and have a strong inclination towards ensuring our clients are 100% satisfied with the work provided which is why we get a lot of repeat business. No job is too small. We have an extensive body of work and can share work done previously specific to client requirements to show the the high standard of work done.
Representation available in UK and Pakistan to cater to different time zones.

abstrac: I am a talented romance and historical writer with experience producing informative blogs on all topics.
bio:
I am a professional blogger with over two years experience in producing web content, product reviews, and informative article writing. 

I am also an avid fiction and creative writer, with a particular interest in Historical, Romance, and Fantasy genres. I run my own blog on writing, academics and organization topics. I also publish short stories, poetry, and novel extracts online, for which I have won several competitions. 

I am practiced in working to briefs and deadlines. I am happy to produce edits if necessary and I will always tailor my work to my client's specifications. All of my work is entirely my own, for which I also proofread, both manually and by checking my work through a variety of software. I am happy to do research and will offer fast response times. I am a highly organized individual and my working language is English. 

I am open to almost any project work, long or short term, and would be more than pleased to create repeat partnerships. Please do contact me if you do not find a relevant sample of my work, as I am most happy to provide paid samples to suit.

I am happy to work to your specification and to tailor our business around your needs. I am comfortable with all forms of communication though I do prefer e-mail, phone calls or conference via Skype. 

All communications will be confirmed in writing via e-mail to avoid miscommunication and all changes, edits and specifications must be conveyed via e-mail prior to completion by me. This is to ensure that you are getting 100% what you are after.
